description:
The highly addictive and critically acclaimed puzzle game is now available for FREE by Zynga!

Zone out to the hypnotic numerical spell of Drop7 in this deceptively simple game that will keep you entertained for hours. 

Drop numbered discs into a grid to stay alive while aiming for chain reaction bonuses.  Master the unique gameplay in seconds, and fine tune your strategies the more you play. 

Key game features include:
1.THREE GAME MODES 
Choose amongst the more relaxed Normal mode, the fast-paced Hardcore mode, and the mysterious Sequence mode.

2.GAME STATE PRESERVED
Ever get frustrated that you have to break your current game and restart when you need to check something on your phone? Well, fret no more. This game preserves your current state, so you can come back to the same session later without losing any progress you have made thus far!

3.LEADERBOARDS
Compare your high scores with your Facebook friends and bring on the friendly competition!
You can also see how well you are doing globally with the global leaderboard.

Try this easy to pick up and very hard to put down game now for FREE!
- PCWorld’s Nine Essential iPhone Apps
- Edge Magazine’s #2 Best iPhone Game of All Time
- One of Esquire Magazine’s “Best Downloadable Games for Any Phone, Console & PDA.”
- “Super-addictive, deranged awesome!” – Wired Magazine
- “Absolutely fantastic.” – Boing Boing
releaseNotes:
Hey Drop7 fans, we have a minor update addressing some maintenance issues with posting high scores to Facebook. 

Become a Drop7 fan! Hear the news first and get exclusive content!
http://www.facebook.com/PlayDrop7
